Ref: KP-CHRS 28-08-2024-10:36:01 AM%
/ Oleksii + Konstantin
Good day,
MV GREEN K-MAX 4 80K DWT / 20 - OPEN IJMUIDEN ON ABT 07-08 SEPT
TRY ANY
TYPE : GEARLESS - SINGLE DECK - SELF TRIMMING BULK CARRIER
SUMMER DWT : ABT 80,856.6 MT DWT ON 14.450 M - TPC   ABT 71.7
BUILT : MARCH 2020
SHIPYARD : COSCO SHIPPING HEAVY INDUSTRY ZHOUSHAN
FLAG : LIBERIA FLAG
LOA / BEAM : 229.0 M / 32.26 M
HO/HA : 7/7
GRT/NRT : ABT 44076 / ABT 27310
HOLD GRAIN CAPACITY : ABT 96828.3 CMB
BREAKDOWN PER HOLD (CBM)
HOLD NO.1 : 12,495.20
HOLD NO.2 : 14,928.90
HOLD NO.3 : 14,465.70
HOLD NO.4 : 12,827.80
HOLD NO.5 : 13,945.80
HOLD NO.6 : 13,889.40
HOLD NO.7 : 14,275.50
TOTAL : ABT 96,828.30
AUSTRALIAN HOLDS LADDER FITTED
SPEED AND CONSUMPTION:
BALLAST: ABT 14.5 KTS ON ABT 25.6 MT LSIFO
LADEN: ABT 13.3 KTS ON ABT 27.0 MT LSIFO
ECO:
BALLAST: ABT 13.8 KTS ON ABT 22.7 MT LSIFO
LADEN: ABT 12.3 KTS ON ABT 22.7 MT LSIFO
ECO2:
BALLAST: ABT 13.0 KTS ON ABT 20.3 MT LSIFO
LADEN: ABT 11.7 KTS ON ABT 20.3 MT LSIFO
PORT CONSUMPTION: ABT 4.4 MT LSIFO (380 CST)
SPEED AND CONSUMPTION IN GOOD WEATHER AND SMOOTH SEA UP TO AND INCLUDING BEAUFORT
SCALE FORCE 4 / DOUGLAS SEA SCALE 3 (1.5 M COMBINED) NO ADVERSE CURRENTS NO NEGATIVE
INFLUENCE OF SWELL ABOUT IS UNDERSTOOD TO MEAN 5% DOWNWARDS IN THE SPEED AND 5%
UPWARDS IN THE CONSUMPTION. ANY GAIN ON TIME OVER THE ABV AND/OR CONSUMPTION BELOW
THE ABV TO BE OFF-SET AGAINST LOSS ON TIME AND/OR CONSUMPTION IF ANY.
SPEED NOT TO BE DEBITED DUE TO FAVORABLE CURRENTS.
VESSEL WILL BURN IFO AND/OR MGO WHILE EXCHANGE BALLAST WATER AT SEA.
VESSEL MAY CONSUMES MGO WHILE MANOEUVERING IN SHALLOW/NARROW WATER, TRANSITING THE CANAL
AND ENTERING /LEAVING THE PORTS/STARTING/STOPPING THE ENGINE AND WHILE BALLASTING / DE-BALLASTING OPERATIONS.
BUNKERS SPECIFICATION (ISO 8217/2010 E).
ALL ABOUT
Best Regards
Konstantin Petrov
